About the Company: Karuturi Global Limited (KGL) is an India-based company. KGL is engaged in the production of cut roses with operations spread across Ethiopia, Kenya and India. With an area of over 292 hectares under Greenhouse cultivation, the Company produces around 555 million stems of cut roses. The Companys operates in a single segment, agriculture. It is also focused on its agribusiness. It has taken up cultivation in Ethiopia. The Companys other business interests include food processing, floriculture retailing, and information technology.
